name: automerge-backend-wasm
description: wasm-bindgen bindings to the automerge-backend rust implementation

scripts.cjs-release: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-name index -d build/cjs && rm build/cjs/package.json
scripts.mjs-release: wasm-pack build --target bundler --release --out-name index -d build/mjs && cp package.mjs.json build/mjs/package.json
scripts.release: yarn cjs-release && yarn mjs-release && yarn prep-release && cp package.pkg.json build/package.json && cp README.md LICENSE build
scripts.build: rm -rf dev && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --dev --out-name index -d dev
